insert into reverse_part_detail ( send_code,pack_no,all_pack_sum,waybill_code, create_site_code,create_site_name,receive_site_code,receive_site_name,type, status,send_time,create_user,create_time, is_delete,ts ) values
( #{item.sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.packNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.allPackSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.receiveSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), 0, now() )
mapper.update:
update reverse_part_detail
all_pack_sum = #{allPackSum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
waybill_code = #{waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_site_code = #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_site_name = #{createSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_site_code = #{receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receive_site_name = #{receiveSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ts = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update reverse_part_detail set is_delete = 1 where id in
#{item,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from reverse_part_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by ts desc limit 1
select count(1) as num from( select count(1) from reverse_part_detail where 1=1 GROUP BY waybill_code,CREATE_SITE_CODE ) t

select waybill_code,CREATE_SITE_CODE,CREATE_SITE_NAME,count(waybill_code) AS allSendPackSum
,all_pack_sum - count(waybill_code) AS noSendPackSum ,all_pack_sum,min(send_time) as send_time,min(receive_time) as receive_time
from reverse_part_detail
where 1=1
GROUP BY waybill_code,CREATE_SITE_CODE limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update reverse_part_detail set receive_time = #{receiveTime},status = 3 where waybill_code = #{waybillCode} and SEND_CODE = #{sendCode}
update reverse_part_detail set status = 2 where pack_no = #{packNo} and RECEIVE_SITE_CODE = #{receiveSiteCode} and status = 1
